Keywords: Excalibur , New Mutants , Robot , X-Men
Real Name: Douglas Ramsey & Warlock
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: ROBOT THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Douglock is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] When Douglock attacks only characters that can use Perplex, each target modifies defense -2. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
02
TEAM UP: EXCALIBUR THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Douglock is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] When an opposing character with the Monster or Hellfire Club keyword attacks Douglock and misses, after resolutions give them an action token. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
TECHNO-ORGANIC SHIFTING: Shape Change. Protected: Outwit.
TECHNO-ORGANIC REPLICATION: When Douglock uses Shape Change and succeeds, you may choose a standard power the attacker can use and Douglock can use that power this game.

Post Comment
Comments
January 18, 2021
tidge
I am not a great fan of dials that rely on Shape Change as the primary means of defense, but I think I may adjust my thinking for this figure... which will become my Warlock stand-in on New Mutants teams. The Willpower/Toughness combination, on top of the long steady dial with both the X-Men TA and Steal Energy, hints that the figure won't necessarily be quickly KOed. Adding flight to the dial is a perfectly acceptable mechanism to reflect Warlock's ability to carry/transport teammates and also avoids most terrain troubles for movement.
January 9, 2021
Cyke82
In the age of shorter dials, eight clicks of life for 60 points isn’t bad. Extend it with traited Shape Change that can’t be Outwitted, and then Doug gets to pick a power from his attacker on every success? Solid harasser with potential.
